title: Guqin Sona Sounds
body: I was messing around with Sona skins on PBE. I found that the Guqin sounds are louder for some reason. It was quite annoying laning with her.

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! 

Sorry for the delay here, I've had this thread up for a while, but have been a bit busy with other skins stuff. >_> Looking into this today!
